# Release & Documentation Checklist (template)

Use this checklist for all production releases. Assign owners for each item before cutover.

- [ ] Release Coordinator assigned
- [ ] Release window and timeline published
- [ ] Product Owner confirms scope & acceptance criteria
- [ ] Engineering Lead confirms merge readiness and addresses critical code quality items
- [ ] QA Lead confirms test pass and open defect assessment
- [ ] Technical Writer prepares release notes and user communications
- [ ] Data Analyst confirms metrics instrumentation and dashboards
- [ ] Rollback plan documented and tested
- [ ] Stakeholder communications ready (internal + external)
- [ ] Final sign-off: QA Lead, Release Coordinator, Product Owner, PM

# Checklist for Documentation Updates

- [ ] Author identified (Technical Writer / feature owner)
- [ ] Docs updated in docs/ or referenced platform
- [ ] Reviewer identified and review completed
- [ ] Version and change log entry added
- [ ] Publish and communicate documentation update
